shortContent:
The character's unarmed combat attacks
do 1d10 + Strength Bonus in Impact Damage, and these
attacks no longer have the Primitive quality.
content:
The character has developed unequalled mastery of unarmed
combat techniques. The character's unarmed combat attacks
do 1d10 + Strength Bonus in Impact Damage, and these
attacks no longer have the Primitive quality.
